name: Thule Chariot Infant Sling - Lite/Cross
description: Provide a stable and comfortable ride for your baby with this infant sling for your Thule® Child Carrier. It's designed for infants from 1 to 10 months who cannot sit unaided. The sling should be used with the Child Carrier as a stroller/jogger only. We do not recommend cycling with a child under 12 months in the Child Carrier.Padding provides lateral support in a reclining position.Includes mounting hardware and instructions.Works with Thule Chariot Sport, Thule Chariot Cross, Thule Chariot Cab and Thule Chariot Lite.
